Misteri semakin mendalam apabila Joey dan Lufty, disertai Julia, diganggu oleh semangat Penunggu Busut ketika dalam perjalanan ke Busut dan mereka tersesat.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shah dan Adam bertelagah kerana Shah ingin menonton wayang dengan rakan barunya. Adam marahkan Shah yang bersikap playboy. Shah mulanya menonton wayang dengan Ana kemudiannya berbohong Ana kerana Nur pula datang untuk menonton wayang juga. Setakat ini helah Shah masih dapat menyakinkan Nur dan Ana. Dalam masa yang sama Bad tahu yang Tar diburu "along" jadi pujukannya untuk bergabung gagal. Dia juga muflis. Ini membuatkan Tar berpakat dengan seseorang iaitu bomoh moden dan kini bomoh moden telah menghantar satu lembaga ke dalam muzium Bad. Sementara itu Abang Lut memaklumkan ada lembaga Nengnab. Kemudiannya Adam bersama Shah dan Daniel berbincang dengan Bad lalu Bad setuju mereka memburu lembaga tersebut. Kemudiannya Abang Lut membuat persiapan awal menanti mereka bertiga tiba dan tempat penginapan telah diatur. Sebelum itu Nur yang tidak suka Kiah berkawan dengan bapanya telah berjaya membuat helah kononya bapanya kini sakit otak dan tidak dapat datang ke Muzium. Akibat percaya, Kiah kini menyampaikan pesanan ringkas kepada Bad yang mereka kini tidak perlu berhubung lagi. Dalam misi mengesan lembaga Nengnab, kali pertamanya tidak dapat diteruskan operasinya kerana Shah terlupa "charge battery" pada alat pengesan. Adam yang merajuk balik dahulu ke kenderaan mereka, kesempatan ketika Shah dan Daniel masih berbincang, Adam telah berhubung Nur. Shah tidak tahu kemudiannya mereka bertiga balik ke hotel, Adam diganggu lembaga di bilik tidurnya kebetulan Daniel datang menumpang biliknya selepas itu akibat Shah berdengkur kuat.

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Di tengah-tengah pelanggaran undang-undang dan rasuah, detektif polis legenda Khun Pan menyertai kumpulan penyamun yang menggerunkan tetapi bergelut dengan kesetiaannya.

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nasha seorang pengurus syarikat kawalan individu atau bodyguard, dia diminati oleh pekerjanya bernama Farish dan Ryan. Ibu Nasha telah meninggal dunia, dia tinggal bersama-sama dengan bapanya. Farish telah memperkenalkan Nasha kepada ibunya tetapi tidak mendapat restu kerana umurnya lebih tua daripada Farish. Syarikat Bodyguard ini telah mendapat tempahan perkhidman dari kliennya yang memerlukan penjagaan keselamatan. Rahul ditugaskan menjaga keselamatan Maya dan anaknya Aiman dari gangguan bekas suaminya Mikhail. Ryan pula memberi perkhidmatan keselamatan kepada Datin Maziah isteri kepada Dato Zailani, Datin Maziah disyaki mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan seorang lelaki lebih muda. Danial pula memberi perkhidmatan bodyguard kepada Eliza anak kepada Dato Zaidi seorang ahli perniagaan yang kaya. Perkhidmatan ini dipohon setelah Eliza diculik untuk mendapatkan wang tebusan. Farish pula diminta menjadi bodyguard kepada Adam anak kepada Dato Nora. Adam dikatakan selalu pulang lewat malam dan berkawan dengan rakan-rakan yang liar. Di akhir Episod, Eliza tidak memberi kelulusan bayaran keraian yang dituntut oleh Encik Amran, ini menyebabkan Amran sangat marah dengan Eliza.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh bersiri dengan kejam memburu seorang wanita pekak melalui jalan-jalan di Korea Selatan selepas dia menyaksikan jenayah kejamnya.

programme.title: Karantina
programme.desc: Ia adalah filem seram tentang empat pelajar kolej yang pergi ke kem untuk mengambil gambar untuk membantu pelajaran mereka. Salah seorang daripada mereka tersesat dan bermulalah cerita.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mariam berjumpa Tok Moh yang mengatakan dia telah diganggu penjelmaan seorang wanita dan tidak lagi mahu berterusan dengan tugasan memisahkan Rafiq dan Sarakit. Mengimbas balik, Mariam enggan memberikan kebenaran untuk Rafiq berkahwin dengan Sarakit. Mariam telah berjumpa Tok Moh untuk memisahkan Rafiq dari Sarakit yang menyebabkan Sarakit diganggu mimpi ngeri. Kini, Mariam pula diganggu penjelmaan Sarakit dan perkara ini diceritakan kepada Rafiq. Rafiq mengambil keputusan untuk pulang kerana memikirkan Sarakit yang masih belum dapat dihubungi. Ramdi pula diganggu hantu tenggek yang dibawa merayau-rayau setiap malam. Pada satu malam, Pak Bado pula mendengar suara bayi menangis dan mendapati bungkusan mengandungi janin di hadapan rumahnya yang diletak oleh lembaga putih berambut panjang.

programme.title: Belaban Hidup: Infeksi Zombie
programme.desc: Jauh di hutan larangan Borneo, tinggal orang asli Dayak. Kampung mereka telah diserang oleh zombi. Pertempuran antara pahlawan Dayak yang sengit dan zombi bermula.

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Maya mengambil perkhidmatan bodyguard bernama Rahul untuk menjaga keselamatan dan anaknya Aiman dari gangguan bekas suami bernama Mikhail. Ika isteri Mikhail akan diberi harta kekayaan bapanya sekiranya mereka mempunyai anak. Ika selalu mendesak Mikhail mendapatkan anak kandungnya dari Maya. Mereka bercadang menggunakan mahkamah untuk mendapatkan Aiman. Farish pula sebagai bodyguard kepada Adam anak kepada Dato Nora, Adam telah terlibat dengan Kumpulan Kobra yang melakukan jenayah. Oleh itu Farish terpaksa menyertai kumpulan penjahat tersebut untuk menjaga Adam. Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Eliza, dia menjaga keselamatan Eliza dari diculik oleh penjahat. Eliza di bawa oleh Rashid berjumpa dengan ibunya yang sakit. Elisa memberi RM 80 ribu untuk perbelanjaan pembedahannya. Ryan yang menjadi bodyguard Datin Maziah isteri kepada Dato Jailani mendapat maklumat Datin Maziah mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan Badrul. Perkara ini dimaklumkan kepada Dato Zailani. Mereka sebagai bodyguard memberi maklumat harian kepada Nasha sebagai ketua jabatan. Ryan secara sembunyi masih berterusan memberi bunga kepada Nasha

programme.title: Balun
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang pemuda, Hassan (Beto Kusyairy) yang membuat keputusan untuk pulang dan menetap di kampung asalnya di Kampung Putra, Kamunting kerana ada beberapa persoalan dan perkara yang harus diselesaikan, di mana salah satu perkaranya adalah perihal tanah milik arwah ayahnya, Mustafa yang dicagarkan pada Orang Kaya Seman sebelum itu.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penyelidik paranormal yang dikenali sebagai 'Puaka X" berputus asa dengan kewujudan makhluk rohani seperti itu, sehingga mereka menemui balai polis yang ditinggalkan di Gombak.

programme.title: Potret Maria
programme.desc: Johan yang sudah lama berkahwin dengan Maria kecewa kerana mereka belum mempunyai anak. Dia ditemukan dengan seorang gadis bernama Seri. Dalam pertemuan itu telah timbul perasaan cinta antara mereka. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan itu tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu Seri yang menganggap Johan hanya ingin mempermainkan anaknya. Maria meminta Seri meninggalkan Johan, tetapi tindakan itu telah menyebabkan Johan marah sehingga menimbulkan ketegangan antara mereka.

programme.title: Dayang Suhana
programme.desc: Dipujuk ibunya untuk berkahwin lagi setelah kematian isteri, Azman bertindak mengupah Dayang Suhana, seorang janda anak satu sebagai orang gajinya atas saranan kawannya. Satu insiden berlaku menyebabkan Dayang pergi meninggalkan rumah Azman. Anak Azman, Nani kemudiannya jatuh sakit setelah pemergian Dayang menyebabkan Azman ingin mengahwini Dayang atas kepentingan anaknya.

programme.title: Perempuan Melayu Terakhir
programme.desc: Kehilangan isteri yang meninggal dunia saat melahirkan anak perempuan, Haikal ingin memenuhi hasrat arwah isterinya untuk membesarkan anaknya, Sofia dalam suasana Melayu. Mahu mencari nilai Melayu yang sebenar, Haikal pergi ke Terengganu dan terjumpa Mustika - lalu jatuh cinta. Pelbagai konflik berlaku kerana Mustika merupakan tunangan orang namun Haikal tidak mahu berputus asa demi mendapatkan cinta Mustika.

programme.title: Jauh Di Sudut Hati
programme.desc: Hazira, tuan punya sebuah ladang estet mengalami masalah rumahtangga kerana suaminya, Taufik lemah syahwat. Namun, beberapa kejadian rogol di ladang estet tersebut telah dikaitkan dengan Taufik menyebabkan Hazira tidak mempercayai tuduhan tersebut.

programme.title: Gadis Hitam Putih
programme.desc: Kota Jakarta telah digemparkan dengan berita kejadian lebih 20 tahun lalu. Dalam satu perbicaraan di mahkamah, seorang jururawat bernama Mira mengaku telah menukar bayi dua keluarga yang mempunyai latar belakang yang berbeza. Mira bertindak sebegitu kerana dia ingin membalas dendam terhadap seorang doktor yang memutuskan cintanya kerana perbezaan darjat keturunan.

programme.title: Mukhsin
programme.desc: Kisah persahabatan antara Mukhsin dan Orked yang mula menimbulkan bibit cinta pertama. Tidak seperti budak perempuan yang lain, Orked lebih kasar kelakuannya bertemu Mukhsin yang pulang bercuti di kampung. Mereka mula menjalin hubungan persahabatan dan menjadi kawan baik - namun mula timbul rasa suka yang mula menimbulkan masalah dalam hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Sepi Itu Indah
programme.desc: Liz seorang gadis remaja yang tinggal di Terengganu bersama bapanya Pak Chad, bekas pejuang kemerdekaan berhaluan kiri. Dia bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis terkenal. Selepas kematian Pak Chad, Liz meninggalkan kampung halamannya dan pergi ke rumah Datuk Kamarul, rakan seperjuangan bapanya yang kini sudah berjaya dalam bidang politik dan perniagaan di Petaling Jaya. Datuk Kamarul mempunyai dua orang anak iaitu Zamri dan Zaiton. Liz kemudiannya menjadi anak angkat kepada Datuk Kamarul dan menyambung persekolahannya dalam aliran sastera. Kehadiran Liz dalam keluarga itu telah membuatkan hubungan Zamri dan kekasihnya Ita, menjadi renggang.

programme.title: Jauh Di Sudut Hati
programme.desc: Hazira, tuan punya sebuah ladang estet mengalami masalah rumahtangga kerana suaminya, Taufik lemah syahwat. Namun, beberapa kejadian rogol di ladang estet tersebut telah dikaitkan dengan Taufik menyebabkan Hazira tidak mempercayai tuduhan tersebut.

programme.title: Potret Maria
programme.desc: Johan yang sudah lama berkahwin dengan Maria kecewa kerana mereka belum mempunyai anak. Dia ditemukan dengan seorang gadis bernama Seri. Dalam pertemuan itu telah timbul perasaan cinta antara mereka. Walau bagaimanapun, hubungan itu tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu Seri yang menganggap Johan hanya ingin mempermainkan anaknya. Maria meminta Seri meninggalkan Johan, tetapi tindakan itu telah menyebabkan Johan marah sehingga menimbulkan ketegangan antara mereka.

programme.title: Dayang Suhana
programme.desc: Dipujuk ibunya untuk berkahwin lagi setelah kematian isteri, Azman bertindak mengupah Dayang Suhana, seorang janda anak satu sebagai orang gajinya atas saranan kawannya. Satu insiden berlaku menyebabkan Dayang pergi meninggalkan rumah Azman. Anak Azman, Nani kemudiannya jatuh sakit setelah pemergian Dayang menyebabkan Azman ingin mengahwini Dayang atas kepentingan anaknya.

programme.title: Perempuan Melayu Terakhir
programme.desc: Kehilangan isteri yang meninggal dunia saat melahirkan anak perempuan, Haikal ingin memenuhi hasrat arwah isterinya untuk membesarkan anaknya, Sofia dalam suasana Melayu. Pelbagai konflik berlaku kerana Mustika merupakan tunangan orang namun Haikal tidak mahu berputus asa demi mendapatkan cinta Mustika.

programme.title: Mukhsin
programme.desc: Kisah persahabatan antara Mukhsin dan Orked yang mula menimbulkan bibit cinta pertama. Tidak seperti budak perempuan yang lain, Orked lebih kasar kelakuannya bertemu Mukhsin yang pulang bercuti di kampung. Mereka mula menjalin hubungan persahabatan dan menjadi kawan baik - namun mula timbul rasa suka yang mula menimbulkan masalah dalam hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Mimpi Moon
programme.desc: Moonir dan Vina, yang merupakan pasangan kekasih zaman kanak-kanak, bertemu semula di kampung halaman mereka di di sebuah komuniti yang tenang dan kecil yang terletak di Pulau Langkawi. Kasih sayang yang pernah mereka hilangkan kini telah disemarakkan semula.

programme.title: Panas
programme.desc: Sofiah terpaksa berkahwin dengan bapa angkatnya, Paiman namun dia tidak rela untuk menyerahkan jiwa dan raganya kepada lelaki itu. Sofiah cuba membina kehidupan yang lebih bermakna dengan meninggalkan Paiman untuk hidup bersama seorang pemuda bernama Ariff. Walau bagaimanapun, Ariff tidak mampu untuk memenuhi kehendak Sofiah.

programme.title: Gadis Hitam Putih
programme.desc: Kota Jakarta telah digemparkan dengan berita kejadian lebih 20 tahun lalu. Dalam satu perbicaraan di mahkamah, seorang jururawat bernama Mira mengaku telah menukar bayi dua keluarga yang mempunyai latar belakang yang berbeza. Mira bertindak sebegitu kerana dia ingin membalas dendam terhadap seorang doktor yang memutuskan cintanya kerana perbezaan darjat keturunan.

programme.title: Sindrom Mana Anakku
programme.desc: Dr. Kamal dan Dr. Lisa bekerja di hospital yang sama. Dr. Kamal keluar mendapat panggilan kecemasan di sebuah rumah. Dibawa pesakit tersebut ke hospital kerana kemungkinan komplikasi kelahiran namun mula tertanya-tanya di manakah anaknya. Anak pesakit tersebut perlu dicari sebelum apa-apa berlaku kepadanya.

programme.title: Sepi Itu Indah
programme.desc: Liz seorang gadis remaja yang tinggal di Terengganu bersama bapanya Pak Chad, bekas pejuang kemerdekaan berhaluan kiri. Dia bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis terkenal. Selepas kematian Pak Chad, Liz meninggalkan kampung halamannya dan pergi ke rumah Datuk Kamarul, rakan seperjuangan bapanya yang kini sudah berjaya dalam bidang politik dan perniagaan di Petaling Jaya. Datuk Kamarul mempunyai dua orang anak iaitu Zamri dan Zaiton. Liz kemudiannya menjadi anak angkat kepada Datuk Kamarul dan menyambung persekolahannya dalam aliran sastera. Kehadiran Liz dalam keluarga itu telah membuatkan hubungan Zamri dan kekasihnya Ita, menjadi renggang.

programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam disabitkan atas tuduhan merompak dan menjalani hukuman penjara selama 17 tahun. Ingin memulakan kehidupan baru dengan harapan dapat berdamai semula bersama keluarganya - tetapi bekas isteri dan anaknya menginginkan yang sebaliknya. Kecewa, Azam kembali ke rakan-rakannya dan berkawan dengan Ayub. Namun dia tidak mengetahui bahawa Ayub menyimpan rahsia yang besar daripadanya.

programme.title: Sumpah Pocong Lintang Bayu
programme.desc: Lintang, seorang gadis yang sedang hamil bertunang dengan Bayu. Penduduk kampung mula memandang serong kepada mereka berdua. Tertekan dengan perkara itu, Bayu dan Lintang membuat upacara sumpah pocong yang bertujuan untuk menidakkan segala tuduhan. Selepas upacara sumpah dilaksanakan perut Lintang tidak juga surut. Bayu pula diserang penyakit aneh yang membuatkan penduduk kampung semakin cemas dan mendesak agar Bayu dipulaukan.

programme.title: Panas
programme.desc: Sofiah terpaksa berkahwin dengan bapa angkatnya, Paiman namun dia tidak rela untuk menyerahkan jiwa dan raganya kepada lelaki itu. programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep198
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep74
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep8
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep172

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep201

Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.title: Definisi Berjodoh Karena Opa

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep201
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep75
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Mawar Cantik Secantik Hatimu
programme.desc: Rama membeli motosikal yang dimiliki oleh Mawar. Mawar meninggalkan pesan agar motosikal itu tidak digunakan untuk tujuan negatif, tetapi Rama mengabaikan pesan tersebut. Sebagai ganti rugi, Rama perlu bekerja di bengkel Mawar. Mawar sedang mencari siapa yang telah melanggar ibunya. Adakah Rama yang bertanggungjawab?

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ep8
programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep12
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officers soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Once In A Summer
programme.desc: A young couple in 1969 meet and fall in love in the midst of economic and political changes and get swept up and torn apart by the political tensions of the time.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Friend: The Great Legacy
programme.desc: Joonsuk recruited Sunghoon, a young guy he met in prison, to help him in the gang. Little did he know Sunghoon was the son of Dongsu, whom he was suspected to kill.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation

programme.title: Going By The Book

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter 2 Ep7

programme.title: Unexpected Business 2 Ep2

programme.title: Happiness Ep4
programme.desc: A new type of deadly virus spreads in the city and an apartment with residents of different social classes is sealed off. Under the fear of the virus, they have to fight and survive in the apartment.

programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote FARM while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep5
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep469
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep21
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep875876
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep693
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3394
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47274728
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep199200
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1856
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep967
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Island of Fire
programme.desc: A cop goes undercover in a prison to find a murderer. When the prison warden enrols him and other inmates for a secret mission, he finally finds the murderer.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.desc: Polo Mints - Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. They have been churning out these little holey wonders since 1948.

programme.title: Supercharged Otters
programme.desc: Charlie Hamilton James has filmed otters for over 25 years and now, through a set of groundbreaking experiments and incredible wild encounters, Charlie wants to reveal why he believes they're so special.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kyrgyzstan - Steve and the team head to remotest Kyrgyzstan in search of snow leopards - if the team can find evidence of the endangered big cat, they could protect the region.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Uzo Aduba - Dropped amidst snow capped mountains, Uzo and Bear move quickly as a storm sets in, sending hail, lightning and flash floods their way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blandings can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Flying Fox - Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet the bat and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon - In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Invasion - Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. Its turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Secret Life of Mini Marsupials - While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Land of Extremes - This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctics most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep12
programme.desc: Seasons - Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year and four seasons looks like for the wildest animals of Canadas East-Coast.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep13
programme.desc: Deer - In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Nio event the Valley is in the throes of drought. Theres been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.desc: A Room For Everyone In Arizona - A family in Phoenix needs to upsize, but they can't agree on how much to spend or how big to go.

programme.desc: Ho Chi Minh City - Rebecca has left the life she knows in New York to follow her career all the way to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

programme.desc: Honoring Lola - A couple moved to Las Vegas with their kids and her mom, but the chance to live together was cut short when her mom passed away.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste of Crackridge / The Bird and the Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep29
programme.desc: Bad Lot-tentant / Jet Fetters - Lotta takes a personality quiz and learns she's supposed to be evil. Tiny and Lucretia offer to get the girls' costumes for the Horn-A-Corn convention.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep29
programme.desc: Agent Ace/Smoove As Ice - Chet can't get him on a cereal box, so Turbo makes Ace Gecko his sports agent; Smoove Move competes in a ski race to prove his worth -- all for love.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep16
programme.desc: Double Booked / Gym Enemy Cricket - When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep16
programme.desc: A Taste of Crackridge / The Bird and the Bee - Archibald's Souper Stew is a surprise hit with the residents of Crackridge. Archibald and his pal Bea reminisce about how they first met.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep22
programme.desc: Too Many Bens! / Dance of the Machines - A lack of predators in the new yard has led to an infestation of Bens, and they are looking for playmates. / The new humans that live in the house notices theres dirt in their yard (i.e. our heroes) so they release a cleaning robot which becomes a deadly menace.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.
