programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep33
programme.desc: Rupert and the Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert and the Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep35
programme.desc: Ruperts Birds Eye View - Rupert and Bill wish they could see more from the Tree House Telescope so Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to give them a better view. Unfortunately the magic is more powerful than they expect and the Telescope Platform, with Rupert and Bill on board, detaches itself and flies off to find a better view. At first, Rupert and Bill are excited to be flying about, but then the Telescope begins to cause trouble, first landing on Ping Pong's Pagoda, then heading to Rocky Bay where it lands on the Lighthouse to enjoy the sea view. By now, Rupert and Bill, who cannot get down, want to go home and the Lighthouse Keeper is beside himself. The Telescope Platform is blocking the Lighthouse light and with night approaching it will be a disaster if they cannot get the Platform to go back to the Tree House.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep36
programme.desc: Rupert and the Memory Man - The friends don't know what to do when a spell goes wrong and Edward loses his memory. Although Raggety summons up the Memory Man to show Edward some exciting memories from his past he still can't remember anything until Rupert gives him one of his very favourite things: an apple..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep35
programme.desc: How Can I Make My Peach Soft? - JESS and the pups give Baa a peach to eat, thinking it will make a change from grass. But the peach is too hard. How can I make my peach soft? Asks Jess. That's the Big Question! He asks Mimi and watches her kneading clay. She explains she's making the clay soft. Jess tries throwing the peach in the air to soften it but all it does is bruise. Horace tells them that the water in his pond keeps his skin soft so Jess and the pups try to soften the peach in water. But it's still hard. They visit Willow who offers the pups some of her lovely ripe cherries. She explains that the cherries went soft and changed colour when they ripened. Jess realises it's the same for the peach. He waits for it to ripen and then gives it to Baa. It's delicious! And now Jess knows how to make a peach soft. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep36
programme.desc: How Can We Help Billy Stay Warm? - Jess, Mimi, Baa and Billie are playing a game, kicking a fir cone into a bucket. But it's so cold that poor shivering Billie can't kick properly. They need to find a way Bilie can stay warm enough. Baa's never cold because of his wool. They find a clump of Baa's wool on the ground but it just falls off Billie when Jess puts it on her and Mimi tells them that glueing it on's a bad idea. What happens when it's summer and Billie wants to be cool? Maybe wrapping her in it, like a blanket, is the answer? It definitely keeps her warm - only problem is, she can't move! They realise that Baa wears a scarf as well. Perhaps they need a scarf for Billie? Mimi knits a tiny scarf for Billie, after twisting the clump of wool into yarn. It's perfect! Billie's toasty warm for their game of Flying Fircones. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep49
programme.desc: Olivia's Snow Day - It's a snow day and school's closed. Olivia takes to the snow-covered streets with Julian as her cameraman, to report on all the snow day happenings. The biggest story of the day turns out to be an alleged sighting of the legendary abominable snowman. Can it be true? Olivia tracks down the real story.

programme.title: Olivia Ep50
programme.desc: Olivia's Ice Spectacular - Olivia can't wait to see skating star Sonja Spencer perform in Cinderella on Ice. She's sure she'll be the lucky audience member chosen to skate with Sonja, and begins practicing on the skating rink she makes in her own backyard. When the show is canceled, Olivia decides the show must go on and she and her friends stage their own ice spectacular.

programme.title: Olivia Ep1
programme.desc: Olivia Plays The Piano - Olivia sees herself as a great concert pianist, though her piano teacher thinks she needs a little more practice. But when her little brother Ian begins taking his own piano lessons and turns out to be pretty good Olivia isn't sure if there's room for two prodigies in the family.

programme.title: Olivia Ep2
programme.desc: Olivia Plays Football - Francine is chosen to play goalie, and Olivia is disappointed that she doesn't get to wear the red goalie jersey. Even worse, the uniform she designs for herself only causes chaos and confusion among her teammates. But when Francine is better at dodging the ball than stopping it, it's up to Olivia to put on the red goalie jersey and save the day

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep33
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!! and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep34
programme.desc: Why Flea Jumps - You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep35
programme.desc: Why Hummingbird Hums - You see there was a time when Hummingbird didn't hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep36
programme.desc: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom - You see there was a time when Baboon didn't have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep69
programme.desc: Puss In Book - While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come / Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After hes rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep36
programme.desc: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies - When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep30
programme.desc: Now It's Con - Audrey, Dot, Lotta, Richie, Lucretia and Tiny arrive at Horn-A-Con and decide to divide and conquer, breaking into three groups for maximum adventure.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep30
programme.desc: Disappearing Act/Sting Of Justice - When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep23
programme.desc: Fleshbeast / Time Leafer - The Mighty Ones are terrorized by the human baby that runs amuck through the yard, but Rocksy is drawn to its power. / Everyone thinks Leaf has gotten loopy, but his theories about time travel might just be what the Mighty Ones need to return to their home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep37
programme.desc: Rupert and the Invisible Foxes - The Fox Twins trick Raggety into turning them invisible with a magical glowing leaf so they can steal Rupert's picnic. When they're discovered Ping Pong tries to reverse the magic but inadvertently makes herself invisible too. Raggety is the only one who can help them but he's lost his magic leaf. Will Rupert and friends be able to find it before its glow finally vanishes and the Foxes and Ping Pong are forced to stay invisible for ever?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep38
programme.desc: Rupert and the Dew Fairy - Rupert and friends are asleep in a tent in Rupert's garden. Rupert wakes up very early to hear sounds outside. He finds Daisy the Dew Fairy, busy scattering dew in preparation for the arrival of the Dawn Chorus. She is very nervous as it's her first day doing the whole of Nutwood and she hopes to earn her golden wings that morning. But then she realises she has lost her dew bucket. Rupert offers to help her find it. Meanwhile, an early-rising Raggety comes across the strange shiny bucket and can't resist investigating. By the time Rupert and Daisy find him he has emptied all the dew out. Daisy is frantic if she doesn't get Nutwood ready in time for the Dawn Chorus she will not earn her golden wings. Rupert persuades Raggety to do elf magic to replace the missing dew and the two of them help Daisy make up for lost time, spreading dew throughout the garden. But what is this Dawn Chorus Daisy talks of? They are in for a wonderful musical surprise when their work is complete.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep39
programme.desc: Rupert and the Apple River - Rupert and friends are going apple picking by the river. It's a hot day, so Ping Pong offers to magic up some fizzy apple drink for them all to drink afterwards. But her spell goes very wrong, sending giant apples rolling down into the river. Just as Rupert is suggesting Ping Pong try again they are all amazed to see Ming float by, surrounded by apply-bubbles. Ping Pong's giant magic apples have turned the river into a fizzy apple juice river, and the bubbles make you float. Soon Rupert and friends are having a great time, sucking in bubbles and floating about. But then Edward notices a problem. The apples are causing a log jam at the bridge and unless they can get them out, the river will flood. How will they get the river back to normal and prevent Nutwood being swept away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep40
programme.desc: Rupert to the Rescue! - Freddy and Freda borrow Ping Pong's Magic Book and accidentally say a spell that makes their toy cupboard float off across Nutwood. Rupert takes charge of trying to stop the runaway item of furniture before it does any damage, trying to lasso it. But the Fox Twins meddle again, and Ping Pong gets tangled up in the lasso, ends up floating high in the sky, dangling from the flying cupboard! Things become even more serious when she floats out over the sea and gets stranded on a rock. Rupert has to make the Fox Twins face up to the trouble they've caused, and find a way to undo the magic.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders how can we hide to watch butterflies? That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx? Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Pearl's Kickball Championship - It's the Neighborhood Kickball Championship! Pearl, the neighborhood's best kicker, has albinism and nystagmus, and so the teams use a Beep Kickball to play. When the ball deflates, Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out how to save the kickball game!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Kitties / Pups Save Tiny Marshall - The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep519
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor - It's Cowboy Day at the Wingnuts Dude Ranch. Mayor Goodway tries to brave the hazards of the ranch all while sleepwalking!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Sky Pirates Pt 2 - Annoyed at being stopped, the jesters steal the crystal which keeps the sky land afloat. Our crew go after it but get separated during their mission. Using skills they've learned from each other, they escape their traps and get the crystal back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Musical Instruments - Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies - Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dressing Up - Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Bear / Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: William vs. Wild - After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Paddingtron/Paddington's First Diwali - Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. // Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant, but will they both get to enjoy the fireworks finale?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Escarlata's Little Sister - Escarlata's plans to steal the Teapot of Delfn are ruined when her new annoying little sister Rosita tags along.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Lost & Flounder / Rumble in the Jungle - Lorelai accidentally loses a magical Merlandian artifact and learns how to stay calm in order to recover it from Pepito. // When Bonnie Bones steals Enrique's ship, he begrudgingly works with the Pirate Protectors to get it back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out / Pups Save Farmer Alex - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Journey Into A Black Hole/ Paddington's Rainbow Race - When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Escarlata's Little Sister - Escarlata's plans to steal the Teapot of Delfn are ruined when her new annoying little sister Rosita tags along.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - When Bonnie Bones steals Enrique's ship, he begrudgingly works with the Pirate Protectors to get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Windy Castle - Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chlo - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets - Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Banana - Dee encourages a friend to say banana and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Top of the Mountain - The friends go on a mountain hiking competition.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Planet Wobble - Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep38
programme.desc: The Caterpillar Badge - The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag makes friends with a caterpillar. She is very hungry, so Tag feeds her the vegetable leaves they have been picking.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Cardboard Box Badge - The dog gets a delivery that arrives in a big box and the squirrels discover that cardboard can be very interesting.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppy Badge - Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay. He's one cute puppy, but he looks like he could cause chaos in the clubhouse. And wait a minute - what's that terrible smell?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia - Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Chimps - Andy heads to Africa to meet some chimpanzee's and tracks down some kapok tree seeds.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Amazing Motorbikes - Grace rides a classic touring bike, then shows off futuristic self-balancing bikes before heading to anindoor motocross course to ride an electric dirt bike.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep14
programme.desc: Camouflage - Captain HeyHo suggests Cook and Line camouflage themselves to beat the Swashbucklers.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep35
programme.desc: The Egg Badge - A newly laid egg has trouble hatching and runs off with just its legs poking out, so the squirrels set off to bring it back safely.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Circus Badge - The Squirrels are excited that a circus has come to town, until they see it is a flea circus. However, they realise it is impressive when they see the acts.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep33
programme.desc: The Tidy Up Badge - A big package arrives for Duggee while he is dusting - an amazing new vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep28
programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep27
programme.desc: The Stokkur Geyser, Iceland - The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep13
programme.desc: Stop That Bus! - Bertie the Bus is waiting to pick up Dowager Hatt and her friends, but Thomas takes him on a tour instead. Unfortunately, Bertie ends up becoming stranded on the Shake Shake Bridge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Seacow Snow Trail - Sarah and Duck have received some Christmas Presents and are keen to find out who delivered them.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Garden Gaming - Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a version he can play.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Snow Flurry - When Mr. Flurry gets trapped in his mobile by the snow, Nelly and Nora help get him out.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dog Loves Heroes - Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city. But a little girl they meet prefers Pug's Power Pug, so he becomes the hero.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Topsy Turvy Time - Monty is in a topsy-turvy mood and doing things a little bit differently, leaving him questioning why things always have to be same.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep36
programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Scarecrow - JoJo and Gran Gran visit the community garden and find birds trying to eat the winter veggies! Luckily, Gran Gran has a plan - they can make a scarecrow to keep the birds away.

programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.desc: Play Ground Found - The team helps a group of residents to construct a huge playground in their tiny courtyard.

programme.desc: The We Love Animals Badge - Duggee is stroking Enid the cat. The Squirrels want to find animals they can stroke too.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
